scripts.prepare:local: mustache config/1337.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/5.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen
scripts.prepare:base-goerli: mustache config/84531.json template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn run codegen
scripts.deploy:local: yarn run prepare:local && yarn run create-local && graph deploy -l 0.0.1 --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 nezz0746/ns-framework
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run prepare:goerli && graph deploy --product hosted-service nezz0746/instate-goerli
scripts.deploy:base-goerli: yarn run prepare:base-goerli && graph deploy instate-base-goerli --node https://subgraphs.alchemy.com/api/subgraphs/deploy --deploy-key --ipfs https://ipfs.satsuma.xyz
scripts.deploy:testnets: yarn run prepare:testnets && yarn run deploy:goerli && yarn run deploy:base-goerli
